title: Bad FPS with mid to high end specs
body:
My FPS are around 200 at the game's start.By the time i get to lane they are at 50 already and whenever i try to engage/fight they drop to under 20. I tried reinstalling several times, just un- and reinstalled my graphic card drivers and done pretty much everything https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684?flash_digest=f4d2d043c8630205f7360071e217613ea4057e13#wq4 suggests. 
My Specs are: 
16341 MB RAM 
AMD FX(tm)-6300 Six-Core Processor (3,5 Ghz) 
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 
ASRock 970 Pro3 R2.0 (Motherboard)

replies.body: This is an issue with 5.7 patch from Riot's side. A lot of users have complained about this (including myself) and Riot will say that it comes from our end. It will not be fixed until they fix it. I have a high end computer and before the patch, I get around 250 fps, now I hover around 60-80 and drops massively in team fights.

Thanks for trying out the steps, though it sucks that your fps is still dropping so much.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will look into this individually with you.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs, and attack it to the ticket.  We'll get back to you!
